social_tooltip_pb_has_replaced.description: Beginning of tooltip shown over a replaced social button, e.g [Privacy Badger has replaced this ]Facebook[ button].

options_remove_origin_confirm.message: Weet U zeker dat U deze oorsprong wilt verwijderen uit Privacy Badger?

non_tracker_tip.message: Momenteel checkt Privacy badger alleen of derde partijen cookies, HTML5 lokale opslag, of canvas fingerprinting gebruiken om uw web-gebruik te tracken. Sommige van deze domeinen gebruiken wellicht tracking methoden die Privacy Badger (nog) niet detecteert.

options_dnt_policy_setting.message: Controleer of de sites voldoen aan het EFF Do Not Track beleid
options_dnt_policy_setting.description: Checkbox label on the general settings page

intro_learns_paragraph.message: The longer you browse with Privacy Badger, the better it gets at protecting you. Is your Badger not blocking anything yet? That's OK! Instead of keeping lists of what to block, Privacy Badger automatically discovers trackers as you browse the Web. So start browsing a little to teach your Badger.
intro_learns_paragraph.description: Intro page paragraph. Also used on the options page as part of an acknowledgement screen in front of the tracking domains list.

invalid_domain.message: Voeg een geldig domein of URL toe.

donate_to_eff.description: Button shown in the popup and on the intro page.

intro_donate_subheading.message: Help us by donating and sharing your support for our tools
intro_donate_subheading.description: Shown below the Donate button on the intro page.

intro_not_an_adblocker.message: Not an ad blocker, I'm different

report_success.message: Bedankt voor uw inzet! We gaan dit verder uitzoeken.

dnt_tooltip.message: Dit domein belooft U niet te volgen

next_section.description: Image alt. text on a couple of "scroll down" arrow buttons on the intro page.

extension_error_text.message: Please tell us about the following error:
extension_error_text.description: Shown in the popup when there is a problem with the user's Privacy Badger extension that we want to encourage the user to tell us about.

data_settings.description: This is an options page tab heading.

whitelist_form_domain_input_placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the Add domain input under the Whitelisted Domains tab on the options page.

domain_slider_cookieblock_tooltip.message: Klik hier om dit domein de mogelijkheid te ontnemen om cookies te plaatsen
domain_slider_cookieblock_tooltip.description: Tooltip shown when you hover over the center part of a slider shown for each domain in the domain list.

popup_instructions.message: potential trackers on this page. These sliders let you control how Privacy Badger handles each one. You shouldn't need to adjust the sliders unless something is broken.
popup_instructions.description: Continuation of the popup message that shows number of trackers

options_domain_filter_block.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

options_webrtc_setting.message: Verhinder dat WebRTC het lokale IP adres lekt *
options_webrtc_setting.description: Checkbox label on the general settings page

intro_welcome.message: Privacy Badger automatically learns to block invisible trackers. Take a minute to see how.

popup_instructions_no_trackers.message: No trackers detected. Hooray for privacy!
popup_instructions_no_trackers.description: Text shown in the popup when there are no trackers on the page.

options_domain_list_tab.description: This is an options page tab heading.

share_button_title_twitter.description: Text that comes up when you hover over the social sharing buttons on the intro page.

first_run_text.message: Leer meer over hoe Privacy Badger uw privacy beschermt.
first_run_text.description: Part of a reminder to visit the intro page. Shown in popup until the user clicks on the reminder link or browses through the intro page.

feed_the_badger_title.message: klik om deze tracker over te laten aan Privacy Badger

options_social_widgets_checkbox.message: Vervang de plugins voor sociale netwerken
options_social_widgets_checkbox.description: Checkbox label on the general settings page

options_incognito_warning.message: ** Enabling learning in Private/Incognito windows may leave traces of your private browsing history on your computer. By default, Privacy Badger will block trackers it already knows about in Private/Incognito windows, but it won't learn about new trackers. You might want to enable this option if a lot of your browsing happens in Private/Incognito windows.
options_incognito_warning.description: Detailed explanation shown under checkboxes on the general settings page

options_domain_search.description: Label for a text input box on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

options_incognito_setting.description: Checkbox label on the general settings page

show_counter_checkbox.message: Laat het aantal geblokkeerde onderdelen zien
show_counter_checkbox.description: Checkbox label on the general settings page

what_is_a_tracker.description: Tooltip that comes up when you hover over the 'tracking domains' link under the Tracking Domains tab on the options page.

intro_report_button.message: Please don't forget to click on 'Did Privacy Badger break this site'. We respect your privacy so we don't send automatic reports.
intro_report_button.description: Intro page paragraph. The quoted message ('Did Privacy Badger break this site') should match the first part of the translation for the 'report_broken_site' message.

options_pb_has_detected.description: Beginning of message on the Tracking Domains options page tab that shows the total number of trackers detected so far.

social_tooltip_button.description: Continuation of tooltip shown over a replaced social button, e.g [Privacy Badger has replaced this ]Facebook[ button].

report_terms.message: De volgende informatie wordt automatisch naar EFF verzonden: de huidige webpagina, de versie van uw browser, de versie van Privacy Badger en de stand van de schuifbalkjes voor de huidige webpagina.

whitelisted_domains.description: This is an options page tab heading.

popup_enable_for_site.message: Schakel Privacy Badger in op deze webpagina

options_domain_type_filter.description: Label for a dropdown control on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

import_successful.message: Tracker lijst en instellingen zijn succesful geupdate!

intro_text.message: U bent nu beschermd door Privacy Badger. Om meer te leren over hoe Privacy Badger werkt, klikt U hieronder voor een kort overzicht.
intro_text.description: Part of a reminder to visit the intro page. Shown in popup until the user clicks on the reminder link or browses through the intro page.

options_webrtc_warning.message: * WebRTC kan uw lokale IP adres lekken. Privacy Badger's standaard instelling setting helpt U te beschermen, maar voor extra veiligheid kunt U deze optie activeren. De prestatie van sommige tools, zoals Google Hangout kan hierdoor verminderen.
options_webrtc_warning.description: Detailed explanation shown under checkboxes on the general settings page

options_general_settings.description: This is an options page tab heading.

domain_slider_block_tooltip.message: Klik hier om dit domein helemaal te blokkeren
domain_slider_block_tooltip.description: Tooltip shown when you hover over the leftmost part of a slider shown for each domain in the domain list.

options_domain_filter_cookieblock.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

show_tracking_domains_acknowledgement.message: I understand; please show me the tracking domains list anyway
show_tracking_domains_acknowledgement.description: Acknowledgement shown next to the checkbox required to reveal the tracking domains list on the options page.

firstRun_title.message: Dank u voor het installeren van Privacy Badger!

import_select_file.message: Kies een bestand om te importeren.

report_broken_site.message: Meld een webpagina die niet meer werkt

tooltip_cookieblock.message: Zet het schuifbalkje in het midden om cookies te blokkeren

intro_beyond_ads_paragraph.message: Invisible tracking happens in all sorts of ways; ads are just the visible tip of the iceberg. Privacy Badger sends the Do Not Track signal to trackers telling them not to track you. If they ignore your wishes, your Badger will learn to block them—whether they are advertisers or trackers of other kinds.

options_domain_filter_dnt.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

popup_help_button.description: Tooltip that comes up when you hover over the question mark button in the upper right corner of the popup.

options_domain_filter_allow.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

share_button_title_google.description: Text that comes up when you hover over the social sharing buttons on the intro page.

intro_donate_heading.description: Part of the 'donate' section on the intro page.

show_tracking_domains_message.message: You shouldn't need to modify anything here.
show_tracking_domains_message.description: Shown above the acknowledgement checkbox required to reveal the tracking domains list on the options page. This is the second paragraph; the first paragraph is the message under the "intro_learns_paragraph" key.

options_domain_filter_all.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

tooltip_block.message: Schuif de balk naar links om een domein te blokkeren

options_domain_filter_user.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

disabled_for_these_domains.message: Privacy Badger is disabled for the domains listed below. You can add a domain either via the Privacy Badger icon in the browser toolbar, or by typing the domain in the box below and clicking the "Add domain" button.

pb_detected.description: Beginning of popup message that shows the number of trackers.

intro_by_eff.message: Een project van de Electronic Frontier Foundation

options_domain_list_one_tracker.message: Privacy Badger has detected one potential tracking domain so far. The slider lets you control how Privacy Badger handles it.
options_domain_list_one_tracker.description: Shown on the Tracking Domains options page tab when Privacy Badger learned of exactly one tracker so far.

tooltip_allow.message: Schuif de balk naar rechts om een domein toe te staan

popup_disable_for_site.message: Schakel Privacy Badger uit op deze webpagina

popup_instructions_one_tracker.message: Privacy Badger detected a potential tracker on this page. The slider lets you control how Privacy Badger handles it. You shouldn't need to adjust the slider unless something is broken.
popup_instructions_one_tracker.description: Text shown in the popup when there is exactly one tracker on the page.

domain_slider_allow_tooltip.message: Klik hier om dit domein toe te laten
domain_slider_allow_tooltip.description: Tooltip shown when you hover over the rightmost part of a slider shown for each domain in the domain list.

intro_privacy_note.message: Your Badger learns locally on your device. Privacy Badger will NEVER share data about your browsing unless you choose to share it.

options_domain_list_trackers.message: potential tracking domains so far. These sliders let you control how Privacy Badger handles each tracker.
options_domain_list_trackers.description: Continuation of message on the Tracking Domains options page tab that shows the total number of trackers detected so far.

intro_not_an_adblocker_paragraph.message: Privacy Badger starts blocking once it sees the same tracker on three different websites. Three strikes and it's out! If you use other privacy tools or ad blockers, Privacy Badger will learn less, but that's OK, it might catch things your other blockers miss.

options_domain_status_filter.description: Label for a dropdown control on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

report_text.message: Omschrijf de fout in het kort.

remove_button.description: This is the label for the 'Remove selected' buttons.

intro_donate1.message: When you use Privacy Badger you join the Electronic Frontier Foundation and millions of other users in the fight for privacy. We are a nonprofit fighting for your rights online. Thanks for joining us!
intro_donate1.description: Part of the 'donate' section on the intro page.

options_domain_search_tooltip.message: To exclude domains, prepend your search term with "-". For example, ".co -.com" will show .co and .co.uk but not .com domains.
options_domain_search_tooltip.description: Tooltip for an "information" icon next to the domain search input on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

intro_disable_button.message: If you think Privacy Badger is breaking a page (a video doesn't play, for example), you can click the 'Disable' button to turn off Privacy Badger for that site.
intro_disable_button.description: Intro page paragraph. The quoted string ('Disable') should match the verb used for the 'popup_disable_for_site' message.

options_domain_list_no_trackers.message: Privacy Badger hasn't detected any tracking domains yet. Keep browsing!
options_domain_list_no_trackers.description: Shown on the Tracking Domains tab on the options page for new and recent installations.

non_tracker.message: Vooralsnog lijkt het erop dat de volgende (derde) partijen u niet volgen

share_button_title_facebook.description: Text that comes up when you hover over the social sharing buttons on the intro page.

description.message: Privacy Badger geeft u meer controle over het gevolgd worden op internet!
